item.title: Creating a Plasmode Simulator for Comparing Causal Estimators with Spatial Interference
item.description: Most statistical methods papers include simulations to check the operating characteristics of the proposed methods. Data generating mechanisms for these simulations are often contrived as mixtures from known parametric distributions. While these simulators do the job, in this post, I demonstrate a simulation technique designed to increase the versimilitude to the study data actually collected. Iâ€™ve used this approach in the past, but only recently learned a name for it: plasmode simulation.
